>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.4wAicxCXZcPLSOVY]{Immortal Tutor (Su)}

Benevolent outsiders showed you the miracle’s sacred tech.

Spell:@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.rJ0acpj21GDJYaim]{Summon Creature} (agathion, angel, archon, and azata only)

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.4MDOCybn18gRrPJX]{First Lesson}: You gain DR/evil with a value equal to 1-1/2 × the spell’s level (rounded down).

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.fm6BLJqrdmKRHX9R]{Second Lesson}: You apply your techlore bonus as an insight bonus to one skill check before attempting the check.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.vjnm4jx3cqW45g71]{Third Lesson}: You and allies within 30 feet who can see you gain a +1 morale bonus to saving throws.

Edit spell in the Details tab.

Spell Preperation should be set to Always Available. And Limited uses set to 1 of 1 /-Day.

Be sure to update the Spell level as you gain access to higher level spells.
